creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; golden brown with dark brown designs; thin lines with parallel curving lines at center; two rounded forms on long sides with stripes of parallel lines; triangular broom-like forms in corners
title: Barkcloth panel
